personalDetails.name: Samin Tejas
personalDetails.title: Backend Developer
personalDetails.shortBio: Im a backend developer at 6D Technologies banglore ! ive been creating reliable, high-performance backend systems for the past 3 years.
personalDetails.longBio: As a Backend Developer at 6D Technologies in Bangalore, I bring 3 years of experience in designing and optimizing high-performance backend systems, particularly within Telecom BSS stacks. My expertise lies in developing and maintaining Java-based billing and payment systems, where I excel in enhancing performance, debugging complex issues, and ensuring seamless operation. I have a proven track record of accelerating billing core systems, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and mentoring junior developers. My skills extend to microservices architecture, containerization with Kubernetes, and rigorous security and performance testing, all aimed at delivering reliable and scalable solutions.
